LanguagData.VPE.PsySetDesc: Move to the next Spellbook. Right click to choose a specific one.\nCurrent: {0}, Next: {1}
LanguagData.VPE.PsylinkGained.Desc: {0} has gained a new level of magical attunement. Having reached that level, {1} magical stats have slightly improved. {1} can now also allocate a point to either learn a new spell, improve magical stats further or unlock a new meditation focus.\n\nArcane experience needed for next level is: {2}.
LanguagData.VPE.MustHavePsychicLevel: Target must have at least one mage level.
LanguagData.VPE.MustHaveHeatAmount: Must have at least {0} magical capacity.
